mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, role, image_url, phone) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{role}, CASE WHEN #{role} = 1 THEN 'https://ikun-edu.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/teacher.jpg' WHEN #{role} = 2 THEN 'https://ikun-edu.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/student.jpg' END, #{phone});
mapper.update: update user set statu= CASE WHEN statu = 1 THEN 0 WHEN statu = 0 THEN 1 ELSE statu end where username = #{username}
